props.name: root
props.description:
Portal root element. When specified, the popover will be rendered into this element.
This is useful for detached windows - pass the detached window's document.body.
If not specified, will auto-detect from triggerRef's ownerDocument.

props.name: triggerSelector
props.description:
CSS selector string to find the trigger element in the DOM.
Alternative to triggerRef for cases where you want to use a selector instead of a ref.

props.name: ref
props.type: RefObject<HTMLDivElement> | ((instance: HTMLDivElement | null) => void) | null | undefined

props.description: 使用颜色配置的钩子 - 从 Context 中获取颜色配置信息

Color Picker Hook

管理颜色选择器的状态和行为
将-100到100范围的滤镜值映射到CSS滤镜的实际有效范围
图片处理钩子，用于处理上传的图片并生成多个不同尺寸的版本

管理颜色的绘制状态，包括 HSL、HSV 等颜色空间的值
当外部颜色变化时，自动同步内部状态

处理 RGB 颜色变化的逻辑，包括：
- 验证 RGB 值
- 根据颜色空间更新绘制状态
- 处理灰度和边界值的特殊情况
- 触发颜色变化回调
根据 WCAG 标准计算对比度阈值
Convert position to color values based on color area type
Convert color values to position based on color area type
Convert slider position to color value string
Color value stabilizer for edge cases

stories.name: Default
stories.description: Default story demonstrates how component consumes color context
stories.source:
import { useColors } from "@choice-ui/colors" export default function App() { return (

Using Color Context

This component consumes the color context from the Storybook preview wrapper:

  • Preview already provides ColorsContext.Provider at the root
  • This component uses useColors() hook to access the shared context
  • Use the buttons in the preview toolbar to control the color profile
  • Any changes in the preview toolbar will affect all stories because they share the context
) }
